title: Enhancing Hospitality Practice Competencies: Programming Education Design Using Visual Output Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming concepts and Java language comprehension
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Programs can be written to implement interactive graphic/animation outputs using the MJava library.
Practical exercises combining object-oriented programming concepts with Turtle Graphics can be conducted.
Visual pattern generation projects utilizing loops/conditional statements can be completed.
Competency in creating 2D graphics applying arrays and nested loops can be acquired.
Capabilities in designing personalized programming education for learners can be developed.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
